title: the great tilde.team migration 2: electric boogaloo
author: ~khuxkm
content:
tilde.team is now on an even beeeeefier rig. bare metal this time! 4cores (8 threads), 64gb ram! just like last time, everything is where you left it, but you will get a scary notice about a man-in-the-middle attack when you connect over ssh. (this is just because the IP address changed). the new IP is 195.201.242.48 and the ECDSA fingerprint is: 
SHA256:R3qNfKIF3IiXhKCbFX6rCKl73yzexi9Wodsow6XFres
for your verification purposes.
